classes.name: Acrobat
classes.effect: Disengage costs 1 action. If this model ends a Move action next to a climbable piece of terrain, it may move to the top. May jump up to 1 stick gaps. If this model falls, place it upright where it landed.

classes.name: Alchemist
classes.effect: Interact actions with flasks or potions cost 1 action

classes.name: Archer
classes.effect: Bows gain quick.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.effect: Daggers are not weak. +1 to melee Attack Result Table rolls
classes.short-effect: +1 to melee Attack Result Table rolls

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.effect: +1 to Will rolls. If this model ends a Move action within a ½ stick of an enemy, it may move BtB.

classes.name: Beast
classes.effect: Can buy 2d10 Def and Mgt without weapon requirements. Cavalry do not get bonuses to Mgt or Def vs. Beasts. Can move a ½ stick when taking a Stand action. Can not use the Interact action
classes.short-effect: Cavalry do not get bonuses to Mgt or Def vs. Beasts. Can move a ½ stick when taking a Stand action. Can not use the Interact action

classes.name: Berserker
classes.effect: -1 to Def rolls. Recover actions are automatically successful.

classes.name: Cavalry
classes.effect: +1 to Mgt rolls when making Attacks against a non-Cavalry model. +1 to Def rolls when targeted with a Melee Attack and -1 to Def rolls when targeted by a Ranged Attack from a non- Cavalry model. Cannot climb terrain. Knows the Trample maneuver.
classes.short-effect: +1 to Mgt rolls when making Attacks against a non-Cavalry model. +1 to Def rolls when targeted with a Melee Attack and -1 to Def rolls when targeted by a Ranged Attack from a non- Cavalry model. Cannot climb terrain.

classes.name: Commander
classes.effect: This model may take an Interact action to let any allied model in LoS immediately take a Move, Melee Attack, or Ranged Attack action.

classes.name: Druid
classes.effect: Knows grasping vines spell. Beasts gain a +1 to Mgt rolls when within ½ stick of this model. Sickles are not unwieldy.
classes.short-effect: Beasts gain a +1 to Mgt rolls when within ½ stick of this model.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.effect: +1 to Mgt rolls

classes.name: Flyer
classes.effect: This model can ignore terrain and other models when taking Move actions.

classes.name: Fool
classes.effect: Knows the Taunt maneuver.

classes.name: Healer
classes.effect: While BtB with an allied model, use an Interact action to make an unopposed Will roll. A success removes 1 condition, doubling the roll removes 2. Knows holy aura.
classes.short-effect: While BtB with an allied model, use an Interact action to make an unopposed Will roll. A success removes 1 condition, doubling the roll removes 2.

classes.name: Hunter
classes.effect: Targets gain no cover vs. ranged attacks. No shot on the run penalty to ranged attacks.

classes.name: Knight
classes.effect: Can buy 2d10 Def without being equipped with a shield. Reroll Def rolls of 1 if equipped with a shield.
classes.short-effect: Reroll Def rolls of 1 if equipped with a shield.

classes.name: Magic User
classes.effect: Can purchase spells.

classes.name: Magical Beast
classes.effect: Can purchase spells. Can buy 2d10 Def and Mgt without weapon requirements. Cavalry do not get bonuses to Mgt or Def vs. Magical Beasts.
classes.short-effect: Cavalry do not get bonuses to Mgt or Def vs. Magical Beasts.

classes.name: Martial Artist
classes.effect: Martial Arts are not weak.

classes.name: Monster
classes.effect: All enemy models within 1 stick have a - 1 penalty to Will rolls. Can buy 2d10 Def and Mgt without weapon requirements.
classes.short-effect: All enemy models within 1 stick have a - 1 penalty to Will rolls.

classes.name: Necromancer
classes.effect: Knows unlife. Scythes gain wounding and are not unwieldy.

classes.name: Pit Fighter
classes.effect: Knows the Distract maneuver. Melee Attacks vs. this model never get a Gang-up bonus.
classes.short-effect: Melee Attacks vs. this model never get a Gang-up bonus.

classes.name: Spy
classes.effect: If this model has cover from an attacker's point of view, the attacker does not have LoS unless they are within 1 stick of the Spy.

classes.name: Spell Sword
classes.effect: Can purchase 1 pt. spells.

classes.name: Swashbuckler
classes.effect: Fencing swords are not weak. -1 reload for harquebus and pistolet.

classes.name: Thief
classes.effect: Interact actions with scenario based objectives or terrain items cost 1 action. Any required rolls for a scenario or terrain based Interact action gain +1dt. -1 reload for 1– handed crossbows
classes.short-effect: Interact actions with scenario based objectives or terrain items cost 1 action. Any required rolls for a scenario or terrain based Interact action gain +1dt.

classes.name: Wretch
classes.effect: Def, Mgt, and Will have a max of 2d6. +2 Mgt with clubs, articulated clubs, fists, torches, and pitchforks.
classes.short-effect: +2 Mgt with clubs, articulated clubs, fists, torches, and pitchforks.

weapon-properties.name: Blood Sacrifice
weapon-properties.effect: When you lose a roll to cast a spell, give this model a staggered token to re-roll the result.

weapon-properties.name: Chain
weapon-properties.effect: Opposing models cannot use Parry against this weapon.

weapon-properties.name: Crushing
weapon-properties.effect: Use 2 actions on a Melee Attack for a -1 to your tagets Def roll, or 3 actions for a -2

weapon-properties.name: Defensive
weapon-properties.effect: This model receives a +1 bonus to Def rolls. Attack Result Table rolls for this weapon receive a -1 penalty.

weapon-properties.name: Entangle
weapon-properties.effect: Do not roll on the Attack Result Table after a successful attack. Instead until the end of this round the target is -1 to Spd and -1DT to Def and Mgt rolls

weapon-properties.name: Item
weapon-properties.effect: you may not make Melee or Ranged attacks with this weapon.

weapon-properties.name: Light
weapon-properties.effect: This weapon emits light(p 10)

weapon-properties.name: Mounted
weapon-properties.effect: Only a Cavalry model may use this weapon. A model with this weapon may have a 2d10 Mgt even though this is one-handed weapon.

weapon-properties.name: Piercing
weapon-properties.effect: Rolls on the Attack Result Table add the listed bonus.

weapon-properties.name: Piercing(+1)
weapon-properties.effect: Rolls on the Attack Result Table add the listed bonus.(+1)

weapon-properties.name: Piercing(+2)
weapon-properties.effect: Rolls on the Attack Result Table add the listed bonus.(+2)

weapon-properties.name: Powerful
weapon-properties.effect: Use 2 actions on a Melee Attack for a +1 to your Mgt roll or 3 actions for a +2.

weapon-properties.name: Quick
weapon-properties.effect: This weapon may take 2 Melee or Ranged Attack actions per activation.

weapon-properties.name: Reach
weapon-properties.effect: This weapon may make a Melee Attack action against enemies within a 1/2 stick.

weapon-properties.name: Reload
weapon-properties.effect: Place the listed number of reload tokens next to the model after making a Ranged Attack.

weapon-properties.name: Reload(1)
weapon-properties.effect: Place 1 reload tokens next to the model after making a Ranged Attack.

weapon-properties.name: Reload(2)
weapon-properties.effect: Place 2 reload tokens next to the model after making a Ranged Attack.

weapon-properties.name: Reload(3)
weapon-properties.effect: Place 3 reload tokens next to the model after making a Ranged Attack.

weapon-properties.name: Somatic
weapon-properties.effect: +1 to Will rolls for each empty hand when casting a spell.

weapon-properties.name: Spell Piercing
weapon-properties.effect: Rolls on the Attack Result table from spells add the listed Bonus.

weapon-properties.name: Spell Piercing(+1)
weapon-properties.effect: Rolls on the Attack Result table from spells add the listed Bonus.(+1)

weapon-properties.name: Unwieldy
weapon-properties.effect: Reroll maximum results on Mgt rolls

weapon-properties.name: Weak
weapon-properties.effect: No matter the wielder's Mgt, attack with this weapon never roll more than 2d6 Mgt if one-handed or 2d8 if two-handed.

weapon-properties.name: Wounding
weapon-properties.effect: Reroll 1's when making Melee Attacks with this weapon.

weapon-properties.name: Short Range
weapon-properties.effect: This weapon may target any model within 1 stick

weapon-properties.name: Medium Range
weapon-properties.effect: This weapon may target any model within LoS. but attacks on targets >1 stick away are at -1DT.

weapon-properties.name: Long Range
weapon-properties.effect: This weapon may target any model within LoS.

spells.name: Blur
spells.effect: Target one allied model with LoS. Until the spellcaster activates again, enemy models do not have LoS to this model unless they are within 1 stick of it.

spells.name: Charm
spells.effect: Targeted enemy takes one action of the spellcasters´choice.

spells.name: Fearful Visage
spells.effect: Target one allied model within LoS. Until the spellcaster activates again, enemy models must win a Will roll vs. this model to move BtB.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.effect: Target a point within 1 stick. Affects a Blast AoE. Roll on the Ranged Attack column of the Attack Result Table for each target affected. Treat any result of less than 5 as 5.

spells.name: Grasping Vines
spells.effect: Target 1 enemy model within LoS. Until the spellcaster activates again, that model`s Spd is reduced by 1, or by2 if the spellcaster´s roll was >= double the target`s

spells.name: Holy Aura
spells.effect: Until the end of the round, the caster emits holy energy that grants allows allied models within a 1 stick to reroll 1`s on Def, Mgt and Will rolls.

spells.name: Ice Blast
spells.effect: Targets a Cone AoE. Roll on the Ranged Attack column of the Attack Result Table for each target affected. Treat any result of less than 5 as 5.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.effect: Affects all models in a Line AoE. Models > 1 stick away gain +1DT to theri Will roll. Roll on the Ranged Attack column of the Attack Result Table for each target affected. Treat any result of less than 5 as 5.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.effect: Target 1 enemy model within LoS. Roll on the Ranged Attack column of the Attack Result Table. Treat a result of less than 5 as 5.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.effect: Target 1 enemy model under 20 pts, within 1 stick. That model is staggered and down.

spells.name: Smite
spells.effect: Target one allied model within 1 stick. The next time this model rolls on the Attack Result Table. Add +1 to result with a success, or +2 if the caster doubled the Unopposed roll.

spells.name: Smoke Cloud
spells.effect: Place a token within LoS of the spellcaster. LoS cannot be drawn through a 1/2 stick radius of this point. Remove the token when  the spellcaster next activates.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.effect: Move 1 obstacle or Model (opposed roll when enemy) up to 1 stick

spells.name: Teleport
spells.effect: Target 1 allied model within LoS. Place that model anywhere on the board, but not BtB with an enemy model. Carried treasure or other objectives may not be teleported.

spells.name: Unlife
spells.effect: Return 1 OoA model to the table and place it within 1 stick of the spellcaster. The retuned model becomes a member of the spellcaster´s warband with the stats of a Zombie, but only 2 actions per activation instead of 3(p 3). A model can only be returned to the table once.

maneuvers.name: Bellringer
maneuvers.use_when: this model hits a target with this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: Place a staggered token next to the target model. Do not roll on the Melee Attack Table.

maneuvers.name: Block
maneuvers.use_when: a Ranged Attack is declared against the model wielding this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: + 1dt to your Def roll.

maneuvers.name: Burst
maneuvers.use_when: this model uses an Interact action
maneuvers.effect: Targets a point up to 1 stick from the attacker, Blast AOE, 2d8 Mgt.

maneuvers.name: Cure
maneuvers.use_when: this model uses an Interact action while BtB with a model in your warband.
maneuvers.effect: Remove one condition or spell effect from the target mode

maneuvers.name: Distract
maneuvers.use_when: a Melee Attack is declared against this model.
maneuvers.effect: The attacking model suffers a - 1dt penalty to its Mgt roll.

maneuvers.name: Drag
maneuvers.use_when: this model hits a target with this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: Move the target BtB with the attacker.

maneuvers.name: Empower
maneuvers.use_when: this model casts a spell.
maneuvers.effect: + 1dt to your Will roll

maneuvers.name: Enhance
maneuvers.use_when: this model uses an Interact action on a model in BtB contact
maneuvers.effect: The next roll this model makes gains + 1dt.

maneuvers.name: Hasten
maneuvers.use_when: you activate any model.
maneuvers.effect: Raise this model’s Spd by 1 for this activation, to a maximum of 3.

maneuvers.name: Inspire
maneuvers.use_when: this model takes an Interact action.
maneuvers.effect: All allied models within 1 stick gain +1 to all Def, Mgt, and Will rolls until the next round.

maneuvers.name: Magic Shield
maneuvers.use_when: a Melee or Ranged Attack is declared against a model wielding this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: Roll this model’s Will instead of Def against this attack.

maneuvers.name: Parry
maneuvers.use_when: a Melee Attack is declared against the model wielding this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: + 1dt to your Def roll

maneuvers.name: Pounce
maneuvers.use_when: this model takes its 2nd or 3rd Move action, ends the Move >1 stick from where it started and also BtB with an enemy model
maneuvers.effect: Place the enemy model down.

maneuvers.name: Prognosticate
maneuvers.use_when: before any player makes a roll.
maneuvers.effect: Add + 1dt or - 1dt to the roll.

maneuvers.name: Rally
maneuvers.use_when: this model uses an Interact action when your warband is broken.
maneuvers.effect: Your warband is no longer broken.

maneuvers.name: Regroup
maneuvers.use_when: you have Maneuver Points left in the Maintenance Phase.
maneuvers.effect: Gain + 1dt to your next Initiative roll.

maneuvers.name: Repel
maneuvers.use_when: this model takes an Interact action.
maneuvers.effect: All BtB models must move 1 stick away from this model, but not BtB with any other model in your warband.

maneuvers.name: Riposte
maneuvers.use_when: this model is still ready and BtB with its attacker after being the target of a Melee Attack action.
maneuvers.effect: Make a Melee Attack against the attacker.

maneuvers.name: Set
maneuvers.use_when: an enemy model that started its activation more than 1 stick away moves BtB with this model
maneuvers.effect: Immediately make a Melee Attack against the enemy model with this weapon

maneuvers.name: Smash
maneuvers.use_when: this model takes a Melee Attack action using this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: + 1dt to your Mgt roll.

maneuvers.name: Sweep
maneuvers.use_when: this model takes a Melee Attack action using this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: Make an attack against every model BtB with this model.

maneuvers.name: Taunt
maneuvers.use_when: this model takes an Interact action.
maneuvers.effect: Enemy models within 1 stick take a - 1 penalty to all Def, Mgt, and Will rolls until the next round.

maneuvers.name: Throw
maneuvers.use_when: this model hits a target with this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: The attacker places the target model down anywhere within 1 stick. Do not roll on the Attack Result Table

maneuvers.name: Trample
maneuvers.use_when: this model takes a Melee Attack action.
maneuvers.effect: Make a 2d8 Mgt Melee Attack against every model within a ½ stick of the attacking model.

maneuvers.name: Weak Spot
maneuvers.use_when: this model hits a target with this weapon.
maneuvers.effect: +1 to the Attack Result Table roll.

leader_traits.name: Enchanted Weapon
leader_traits.effect:
Choose one weapon. It gains: 
→ Emits light (p 10) 
→ 1-handed weapons may have 2d10 Mgt 
→ 2-handed weapons gain +1 to Mgt rolls

leader_traits.name: Enchanted Weapon with Light
leader_traits.effect: Choose one weapon. It gains: Emits light

leader_traits.name: Enchanted Weapon One Handed
leader_traits.effect: Choose one weapon. It gains: 1-handed weapons may have 2d10 Mgt

leader_traits.name: Enchanted Shield
leader_traits.effect: Must be wielding a shield. The leader cannot be targeted by Ranged Attacks.

leader_traits.name: Extraplanar
leader_traits.effect: The leader gains the Flyer class.

leader_traits.name: Hero/Villain
leader_traits.effect: Double the point value of this model. It can activate twice in a round, but not twice in a row. Remove movement tokens when you activate the 2nd time. Best if both leaders have this ability. Talk to your opponent when building warbands.
leader_traits.short-effect: The Model can activate twice in a round, but not twice in a row. Remove movement tokens when you activate the 2nd time. Best if both leaders have this ability. Talk to your opponent when building warbands.

leader_traits.name: Mage Killer
leader_traits.effect: + 1dt to Attack rolls vs. models that can cast spells. + 1dt to Will rolls vs. spells

leader_traits.name: Majestic
leader_traits.effect: Any time a model in your warband has LoS to the leader and makes a Will roll, that model may use the leader’s Will instead.

leader_traits.name: Noble
leader_traits.effect: Attack actions targeting this leader instead target any other model in the leader’s warband that is within ½ stick and is fewer points than the Leader.

leader_traits.name: Monstrous
leader_traits.effect: Non-leader models must win a Will roll vs. your leader to move BtB.

leader_traits.name: Sorcerer
leader_traits.effect: 2 point spells cost 1 action to cast.

warband_traits.name: Adventuring Party
warband_traits.effect: This warband may not have more than 1 of any class. Gain 1 extra Maneuver Point per round
warband_traits.short-effect: Gain 1 extra Maneuver Point per round

warband_traits.name: Beast Folk
warband_traits.effect: May purchase natural weapons.

warband_traits.name: Comrades in Arms
warband_traits.effect: Models in this warband may all have 2 classes, however, 1 class must be shared by every model in the warband and not have a limit to how many a warband may have.

warband_traits.name: Coven
warband_traits.effect: This warband may have up to 3 magic users and 3 beasts

warband_traits.name: Deep Dwellers
warband_traits.effect: Not affected by darkness. +1 Mgt to attacks with hammers and picks.

warband_traits.name: Fanatics
warband_traits.effect: Roll Will with + 1dt for all rolls except Cast Spell actions.

warband_traits.name: Forces of Chaos
warband_traits.effect: Once per round force your opponent to reroll a single maximum die result.

warband_traits.name: Forces of Law
warband_traits.effect: Once per round reroll a single die result of 1.

warband_traits.name: Forest Folk
warband_traits.effect: If models in this warband end a Move action next to a climbable piece of terrain, they may move to the top. Double the number of archers and hunters this warband may have.
warband_traits.short-effect: If models in this warband end a Move action next to a climbable piece of terrain, they may move to the top.

warband_traits.name: Glory Hounds
warband_traits.effect: After any model in this warband takes an enemy model OoA after a double or triple on the attack roll, that model may use the Inspire maneuver without spending a Maneuver Point.

warband_traits.name: Monster Squad
warband_traits.effect: Double the number of beasts, flyers, magical beasts, and monsters this warband may have. Not affected by darkness.

warband_traits.name: Otherworldly
warband_traits.effect: All models in this warband may purchase a 1 pt. spell.

warband_traits.name: Rabble
warband_traits.effect: Every model except the leader must be a fool or wretch. Add 1 wretch to your warband for free.

warband_traits.name: Small Folk
warband_traits.effect: Disengage costs 1 action. Melee Attacks vs. this warband never get a Gang-up bonus. May not purchase 2d10 Def or Mgt.
warband_traits.short-effect: Disengage costs 1 action. Melee Attacks vs. this warband never get a Gang-up bonus.

warband_traits.name: Soldiers
warband_traits.effect: At least half the members of this warband must be fighters. If models in this warband are BtB with an ally, they gain +1 to Def rolls
warband_traits.short-effect: If models in this warband are BtB with an ally, they gain +1 to Def rolls

warband_traits.name: Swamp Dwellers
warband_traits.effect: Water and swamp terrain is not difficult. May purchase bite and tail natural weapons.

warband_traits.name: Thieves Guild
warband_traits.effect: All warband members must be acrobats, assassins, spies, and thieves. Interact costs 1 action for this warband. Not affected by darkness.
warband_traits.short-effect: Interact costs 1 action for this warband. Not affected by darkness.

warband_traits.name: Tribal
warband_traits.effect: All warband members must be barbarians, beasts, berserkers, and hunters. +1 to Mgt with 2-handed weapons.

warband_traits.name: Undead
warband_traits.effect: Recover actions are automatically successful. May purchase bite and claw natural weapons. Not affected by darkness.
warband_traits.short-effect: Recover actions are automatically successful. Not affected by darkness.

warband_traits.name: Witch Hunters
warband_traits.effect: Once per round, when a model from this warband is BtB with a down or staggered enemy, it can take an Interact action to make the enemy OoA. This warband may not include any models that cast spells except a Healer.
